question: Which method provides the best trade-off between quality/diversity?
reasoning:
To solve the problem, I will follow these steps:

1. Examine graph (a) to identify which method has the highest LM score, indicating better quality and diversity.
2. Look at graph (b) to determine which method has the lowest decoding time, indicating efficiency.
3. Compare the results from both graphs to find the method that provides the best trade-off between quality/diversity and decoding time.

In graph (a), the Beam Search method has the highest LM score, indicating better quality and diversity. In graph (b), Beam Search also has the lowest decoding time, indicating efficiency. Therefore, Beam Search provides the best trade-off between quality/diversity and decoding time.
